university_name: ETH Zurich (Swiss Federal Institute of Technology)

undergraduate.gpa_requirement: Near equivalent of 38 out of 42 points in International Baccalaureate (IB) or equivalent qualifications with specific subject requirements

costs.tuition_annual_usd: CHF 2,190 (approx. $2,390 USD per academic year as of 2025-26)
costs.financial_aid_available: Limited financial aid and scholarships available; primarily merit-based

required_courses: Mathematics and Physics at Higher Level (IB) or equivalent
recommended_courses: Strong performance in standardized international exams
admission_requirements.extracurricular_importance: Moderate; strong technical skills and academic record prioritized

student_life.campus_size: Near city center, compact urban campus
student_life.housing_guarantee: No universal housing guarantee; competitive student housing
student_life.dining_options: Multiple dining halls, cafeterias with affordable meals
student_life.study_abroad_programs: Exchange programs available with partner universities worldwide

special_features: One of the top technical universities globally
Strong engineering and technology focus with cutting-edge research
Close industry partnerships in Switzerland and globally
Multilingual environment with emphasis on German and English
Low tuition fees compared to other top-tier universities
